comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From ranger95.com/civil_war/virginia/artillery/2nd_arty_regt.html "Co. H. Capt. William W. Cosby's Co; enlisted February 4, 1862, for one year, reorganized May 19, 1862, subsequently became Co. H, 22nd Bn. Va. Inf. Captains: William W. Cosby, John S. Bowles." Presumably also the same guy: books.google.com/books?id=jzoUAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA933&l...
